text: The Liberal Democratic Party (Japanese:自由民主党 Jiyū-Minshutō; or just Jiminto) is one of the main political parties in Japan. It has ruled Japan for most of the time since World War II. The party is conservative. The current leader is Shigeru Ishiba. The party wants a close relationship with the United States, and wants fast export-based economic growth. They also want to undergo more privatization. The party is social conservative,Inada, Miho; Dvorak, Phred. "Same-Sex Marriage in Japan: A Long Way Away?" . The Wall Street Journal. 20 September 2013. Retrieved 31 March 2014. and is against the legalization of same-sex marriage. Jiminto is also a Japanese nationalist political party. In 2012, the Liberal Democratic Party had around 800,000 members.Japan Times What’s the LDP’s true agenda? 23 March 2013 == Reference views == == Other websites == *The official website of Liberal Democratic Party *Japanese123 Category:Political parties in Japan Category:Conservative parties Category:Nationalist organizations in Asia
title: Liberal Democratic Party (Japan)
